welcome_benefits: 5% cashback on first EMI spend up to Rs. 1,000 and additional welcome gift vouchers worth Rs. 500 on spending Rs. 5,000 within 30 days of card generation

Movie & Dining: 25% Discount Up to ₹100 on District App. 20% Discount on Popular Restaurants
Rewards Rate: 3X Reward Points Till Spends of ₹20,000. 10X Reward Points After Incremental Spends of ₹20,000
Travel: Four Free Railway Lounge Access Each Quarter (Spend ₹20,000 Each Month to Unlock)
Insurance Benefits: Personal Accidental Cover Worth ₹2 Lakh and Lost Card Liability Cover of ₹25,000

fees_charges.Interest Rates: Starting from 0.75% and goes up to 3.5% per month.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver on Fuel Transactions Between ₹200 and ₹5,000 (Maximum ₹200 Each Statement Cycle)

product_details: 10X Reward Points on spends of ₹20,000 and above.
Interest rates start at 0.75% per month.
Complimentary railway lounge access 4 times in a quarter.
Personal Accidental Cover worth ₹2 lakh on all active cards.
Fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel purchases up to ₹200 per month.
